FuncDef: This command configures ICMPv6 redirect messages. When enabled, ICMPv6 redirects are generated when routes are not optimal on this router and another router on the same subnetwork has a better route in order to alert that node that a better route is available.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of version 6 redirects are to be issued in the time frame specified by the seconds parameter. Values-10 to 1000. ParamDefault: Default- 100
Specifies the time frame, in seconds, that is used to limit the number of version 6 redirects issued. Values-1 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
